title: Restore Version 6 codebase

requirements.text: Revert the entire codebase to Version 6 state, discarding all changes made in versions 7 through 11

quotes: i want old 6 the version of code

acceptanceCriteria: All backend files match their Version 6 state exactly
All frontend files match their Version 6 state exactly
Version control reflects rollback to Version 6
No remnants of versions 7-11 remain in the codebase

constraints: Must restore complete Version 6 codebase without any modifications
Must not merge or cherry-pick features from versions 7-11
nonGoals: Deploying to production (user will decide deployment timing separately)
Preserving any features or changes from versions 7-11
Creating a hybrid version combining Version 6 with later changes
